ygData.subject: Cast-Iron Rapier??????
ygData.msgSnippet: I never saw this item before today, when I bought it from a vendor in Kelethin for 6 gold and some silver... Stats are DMG 4 DLY 23 WT 5.0 Class: War Shd Rng
ygData.messageBody:
I never saw this item before today, when I bought
it from a vendor in Kelethin for 6 gold and some
silver... Stats are DMG 4 DLY 23 WT 5.0 Class: War Shd Rng
Brd Rog Race:all. These stats are better then a
bronze rapier and it is less expansive! A bronze Rapier
from a vendor goes for around 5pp. Also the Cast-iron
Rapier looks like a sword when equiped (like the rusty
ones). Who can tell me more about this weapon and where
it is found? It's a great weapon for my newby bard
(now lvl 3 nearly 4). I thought it might be a summoned
weapon because it sounded to good to be through, but it
would not be at a vendor then also I logged out and
back on and to my joy it was still on my char. So
please if anyone knows more on this weapon tell
me!<br><br>Alrix,<br>Very Happy Bard of 3 seasons,<br>Beroxxulous.
